name: Tea Party With The Enemy
description:
Warning:

This demo uses pre-made assets provided by RPG Maker VX Ace Lite

This is made for fun, but if this gets positive reviews, I will finish it.

you play as Princess Reena, she struggles to live in a world where almost everyone hates her. Her mother is hated for committing murder and they fear she will be destined to do the same. What will happen to Reena? Will she ever find a reason to move on from a past she can't avoid? Find out, when the full game releases, in the meantime, enjoy this little demo I have made.
